Package com.javaoop.movie_booking_app.service

package com.javaoop.movie_booking_app.service
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.javaoop.movie_booking_app
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BookingService
    Service class responsible for managing movie ticket bookings.
    HallService
    Service class responsible for managing halls and their seats.
    JpaUserDetailsService
    Service implementing Spring Security's UserDetailsService interface.
    MemberService
    Service class for managing member-related operations such as registration, password changes, and retrieval by email.
    MovieService
    Service class to manage movie-related operations such as retrieval and status updates.
    SeatService
    Service class for managing seat-related operations such as retrieval and conflict checking.
    ShowtimeService
    Service class for managing showtime operations such as creation, update, retrieval, and conflict checking for movie showtimes in halls.
